nodes.text: Nova Orion Station was a space station in Bright Jewel system. It was built by and served as the headquarters for Nova Orion Industries.

Nova Orion Station and the surrounding Bright Jewel system were added to Star Wars Galaxies with Chapter 8 in January 2008. It was a copy of Tansarii Point Station which was used in the game's introductory player tutorial, but with different inhabitants and quests. It was only accessible to players that owned a ship. Star Wars Galaxies was shut down on December 15, 2011.
